name: Web Application Hacking
description: Techniques for identifying and exploiting security flaws in web applications.

cards.title: Understanding the OWASP Top 10
cards.description: A deep dive into the most critical security risks affecting web applications.
cards.bulletpoints: SQL Injection, XSS, CSRF, Broken Authentication

cards.title: Exploiting Web Vulnerabilities
cards.description: Hands-on exploitation techniques using Burp Suite, Metasploit, and other tools.
